title: Phishing Campaign Targeting Financial Services
description: Sophisticated phishing campaign detected targeting employees of multiple financial institutions through email impersonation.
initial_findings: Emails contain malicious links disguised as password reset notifications from a fake internal IT support portal.

observed_ttps.name: Phishing: Spear Phishing Attachment
observed_ttps.description: Attackers sent targeted emails with malicious attachments

observed_ttps.name: Valid Accounts
observed_ttps.description: Potential attempt to use compromised credentials

indicators_of_compromise.description: Malicious executable disguised as IT support tool

title: Cloud Infrastructure Unauthorized Access
description: Detected unauthorized access and potential data exfiltration from AWS cloud environment.
initial_findings: Multiple API calls from unusual geographic locations detected outside of normal business hours.

indicators_of_compromise.description: Suspicious container with unexpected network activity

title: Industrial Control System Reconnaissance
description: Detected potential reconnaissance activities targeting industrial control systems in manufacturing facility.
initial_findings: Unusual network scanning and probing of SCADA systems from external IP addresses.

observed_ttps.name: Network Service Scanning
observed_ttps.description: Probing of network services and protocols

indicators_of_compromise.description: Custom file extension associated with ICS scanning tools

title: Mobile Device Malware Infection
description: Detected sophisticated mobile malware targeting corporate mobile devices through third-party app store.
initial_findings: Multiple Android devices showing signs of unauthorized data access and communication with command and control servers.

title: Ransomware Attack on Healthcare Network
description: Critical ransomware infection spreading across hospital network, encrypting patient records and medical systems.
initial_findings: Multiple Windows servers showing signs of encryption, with ransom note detected on primary file servers.

title: Supply Chain Software Compromise
description: Detected malicious code injection in widely-used third-party software development toolkit.
initial_findings: Multiple development environments showing unexpected network connections and suspicious compilation artifacts.

observed_ttps.name: Supply Chain Compromise: Compromise Software Dependencies
observed_ttps.description: Malicious code inserted into software build process

title: Advanced Persistent Threat in Research Network
description: Sophisticated nation-state level cyber espionage targeting scientific research infrastructure.
initial_findings: Persistent network backdoors and advanced data exfiltration mechanisms discovered in high-performance computing cluster.

observed_ttps.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
observed_ttps.description: Data stolen through command and control infrastructure

observed_ttps.name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools

title: Critical Infrastructure IoT Botnet Infiltration
description: Large-scale botnet compromise of industrial IoT devices in power distribution network.
initial_findings: Hundreds of smart meters and grid sensors showing synchronized malicious network behavior.

title: Financial Trading Platform Zero-Day Exploit
description: Critical zero-day vulnerability discovered in high-frequency trading platform, potentially allowing market manipulation.
initial_findings: Unusual trading patterns and unauthorized API access detected in multiple financial institutions.

observed_ttps.name: Lateral Movement
observed_ttps.description: Movement between different trading platform instances

title: Automotive Manufacturing Control System Breach
description: Sophisticated cyber attack targeting industrial control systems in automotive production line.
initial_findings: Unauthorized modifications to robotic assembly line programming detected, potential sabotage attempt.

observed_ttps.name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools
observed_ttps.description: Attempts to modify industrial control system configurations

title: Healthcare Learning Management System Data Leak
description: Misconfigured cloud storage exposed sensitive medical training records and personal information.
initial_findings: Publicly accessible cloud bucket discovered with unencrypted medical training documents and student records.

observed_ttps.name: Unsecured Credentials: Credentials In Files
observed_ttps.description: Sensitive information exposed in configuration files

title: Telecommunications Network DNS Hijacking
description: Large-scale DNS hijacking attack redirecting customer internet traffic through malicious servers.
initial_findings: Widespread DNS resolution anomalies detected across multiple network segments.

observed_ttps.name: Application Layer Protocol: Web Protocols
observed_ttps.description: Using HTTP/HTTPS for command and control

title: Aerospace Defense Contractor Network Intrusion
description: Sophisticated cyber espionage targeting sensitive military technology research networks.
initial_findings: Advanced persistent threat group discovered with deep network penetration and data exfiltration mechanisms.

observed_ttps.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter: Unix Shell
Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
observed_ttps.description: Covert data extraction through command and control infrastructure

title: E-Commerce Platform Payment System Breach
description: Critical vulnerability in payment processing system allowing unauthorized financial transactions.
initial_findings: Detected multiple fraudulent transactions bypassing standard payment verification mechanisms.

observed_ttps.name: Lateral Movement
observed_ttps.description: Unauthorized access across payment processing systems

title: Smart City Infrastructure IoT Botnet Infiltration
description: Large-scale compromise of municipal IoT devices controlling traffic management and public utilities.
initial_findings: Synchronized malicious control of traffic lights, surveillance systems, and environmental sensors.

observed_ttps.name: Resource Hijacking
observed_ttps.description: Unauthorized use of IoT device computing resources

observed_ttps.name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools
observed_ttps.description: Attempts to compromise municipal infrastructure monitoring

indicators_of_compromise.description: Configuration for coordinated IoT device manipulation

title: Zero-Day Exploit in Web Application Framework
description: Critical zero-day vulnerability exploited in widely-used web application framework, leading to unauthorized access.
initial_findings: Multiple web servers compromised through sophisticated exploit chain.

title: Insider Threat Data Exfiltration
description: Detected unauthorized data access and exfiltration by privileged user.
initial_findings: Unusual data access patterns and large file transfers to external storage.

title: IoT Device Botnet Recruitment
description: Multiple IoT devices compromised and recruited into botnet for DDoS attacks.
initial_findings: Unusual network traffic patterns and device behavior changes.

title: Cryptocurrency Mining Malware
description: Unauthorized cryptocurrency mining software detected on multiple servers.
initial_findings: High CPU usage and suspicious network connections to mining pools.

title: API Key Compromise
description: Unauthorized use of API keys for cloud service access.
initial_findings: Unusual API usage patterns and unexpected resource creation.

title: DNS Tunneling Attempt
description: Detected DNS tunneling activity for data exfiltration.
initial_findings: Unusual DNS query patterns and large volume of DNS requests.

title: Privilege Escalation via Kernel Exploit
description: Attempted privilege escalation using kernel vulnerability.
initial_findings: Suspicious system calls and kernel module loading attempts.

title: Social Engineering Attack
description: Successful social engineering attack leading to unauthorized access.
initial_findings: Employee credentials compromised through phishing.

title: Container Escape Attempt
description: Attempted escape from containerized environment to host system.
initial_findings: Suspicious system calls and host resource access attempts.

title: Wireless Network Attack
description: Attempted man-in-the-middle attack on corporate wireless network.
initial_findings: Rogue access point detected and suspicious ARP traffic.

title: Database Injection Attack
description: SQL injection attempt on web application database.
initial_findings: Malicious SQL queries detected in web application logs.

indicators_of_compromise.value: SELECT * FROM users; DROP TABLE users;

title: Fileless Malware Execution
description: Fileless malware detected using PowerShell for execution.
initial_findings: Suspicious PowerShell commands and memory-only execution.

title: Cloud Storage Misconfiguration
description: Publicly accessible cloud storage bucket containing sensitive data.
initial_findings: Unauthorized access to cloud storage resources.

title: Network Segmentation Bypass
description: Attempted bypass of network segmentation controls.
initial_findings: Unauthorized network access between segmented zones.

title: Supply Chain Attack
description: Malicious code injected into software supply chain.
initial_findings: Compromised software package in dependency repository.

title: Credential Stuffing Attack
description: Automated credential stuffing attack against web application.
initial_findings: Multiple failed login attempts from various IP addresses.

title: Memory Corruption Exploit
description: Attempted exploitation of memory corruption vulnerability.
initial_findings: Suspicious memory access patterns and crash dumps.

title: Web Shell Upload
description: Malicious web shell uploaded to web server.
initial_findings: Suspicious PHP file detected in web root directory.

title: Network Protocol Attack
description: Attempted exploitation of network protocol vulnerability.
initial_findings: Malformed network packets and protocol violations.

title: Configuration File Tampering
description: Unauthorized modification of system configuration files.
initial_findings: Changes to critical configuration files detected.

observed_ttps.name: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools

title: API Endpoint Abuse
description: Unauthorized use of API endpoints for data scraping.
initial_findings: Abnormal API usage patterns and rate limit violations.

title: Firmware Modification
description: Unauthorized modification of device firmware.
initial_findings: Firmware integrity check failures and unexpected behavior.

title: Log Tampering
description: Attempted modification of system logs to hide malicious activity.
initial_findings: Gaps in log files and suspicious log entries.

observed_ttps.name: Impair Defenses: Disable Windows Event Logging

title: Network Traffic Analysis Evasion
description: Attempted evasion of network traffic analysis tools.
initial_findings: Encrypted and obfuscated network traffic patterns.
